node.text:
People already have enough poisons and toxins inside their liver, brain and bodies. We don’t know when to stop, we take in more and more everyday. We become sheeple and pattle, a herd being slowly driven to our 3rd, 4th, 5th neurologist, because we be become sick and our bodies say, no more please. 

The problem is we don’t know what’s toxic, so we end up intoxicating ourselves day in and day out, believing we’re living healthy. 

Perfumes, colognes, scented candles, air fresheners, scented laundry detergents, scented fabric softeners, hair care products, aftershaves, body lotions & more are filled with chemicals agents, chemical poisons, hidden under the labels “fragrance” “perfume” “parfume” “naturally derived scents” and more… it’s the secret fragrance war on our bodies. 

If you didn’t catch video Part 1, go watch it.

#medicalmedium

node.text:
These days everyone is so worried about what they are putting in their bodies. In the grocery store people are reading the ingredient lists on packages and bottles, people want clean food, farm to table, and freshly caught or harvested foods. 

Everyone seems to be an expert on healthy eating and healthy living. Meanwhile, all these experts are drowning themselves in perfume, cologne, air fresheners, scented laundry detergents, fabric softeners, scented hair products, so called naturally derived chemical scents, while they’re burning their scented candles. 

At the same time people are saturating themselves with these chemical based products, they don’t have a clue on how many patented, poisonous, toxic chemical agents they are exposing themselves to. 

Have you ever wondered what ingredients are in perfume and cologne? Have you ever wondered what ingredients are in fragrance?

Read more about how toxic fragrances are in the New York Times Best-Selling book Cleanse To Heal

Also check out Medical Medium Podcast Episode: Air Fresheners, Scented Candles, Colognes, & Perfumes 

#medicalmedium

node.title: Perfumes, Colognes, Scented Candles, & Air Fresheners Part 1

node.text:
No one is lacking fat in the diet as there is fat in almost every food including dairy, eggs, cheese, meats, fruits, vegetables, grains and beans. No one is deficient of omegas in the brain, but everyone is lacking Glucose to the brain. 

People are not getting enough Glucose and because of the lack of Glucose to the brain, their brains start to shrink as the years go by and they age.  

Toxic Heavy Metal exposure is on the rise like never before. Contamination from seafood, sushi, fish oil, aluminum foil, canned tuna, house hold cleaning supply’s, insecticides, recreational drugs, medications, perfume, cologne, air fresheners, scented candles, fabric softeners, and  much much more. 

The more Fats in the diet, the more corrosion occurs to the Toxic Heavy Metals inside the brain. They interact with the electricity in your shrinking brain and set the stage for Depression, Anxiety, Bipolar, Mania, OCD, Memory Loss, Alzheimers, unexplained outbursts, crying, Anger and chronic Sadness. And then we are on lots of prescription meds day in and day out. 

Too much Fat and not enough of the good stuff your brain needs, lowering the Fats in your diet is a great start to preventing chronic illness.

#medicalmedium

node.text:
READ THIS IF YOU THINK THE BRAIN IS MOSTLY MADE OF FAT. 

The theory that our brain is mostly made  up of fat is misinformation 

The cadaver brains used to estimate how much fat is in the human brain were from people who were obese  and on a Standard American Diet. The cadaver brains had built up fat deposits in and all around the brain, this increased the percentage of fat raising percentages to 20 to 30 percent higher than a healthy brain in a non obese individual.

This is similar to animals that are caged up or not free range at industrial farms being fed GMO soy, corn, and even pigs or chickens blood. The organs including the brain becomes riddled in fat that shouldn’t be there. 

This is much different then wild game or grass fed beef or uncaged free range animals which have a lower percentage of fat in organs and the brain. 

A healthy human brain contains less than 10 percent fat. 

Our brain runs on glucose and is mostly comprised of stored Glycogen, in other words, Sugar.

If our brain is completely without glucose for more than 5 seconds, it starts to die. 

#medicalmedium

node.text:
We are being taught to Fat Ourselves to Death.

We are being told that we need fat and to choose healthy fats. 

Today’s diets are mostly Fat based, and it’s guaranteeing sickness to worsen over time for someone who already has chronic illness and even someone who isn’t sick with a condition or symptom yet. 

People think only unhealthy fats from fried foods, fast foods, take out foods cause cardiovascular conditions but in reality it’s all fats when eaten excessively that cause cardiovascular conditions. 

Even healthy fats build up in the arteries, veins, blood vessels and heart throughout the years. These fats are toxin soluble. Toxin Soluble means all manners of poisonous toxic chemicals in your food, environment, water, and air absorb into the fat and become plaque that clings to the walls of your heart. 

This happens regardless of you adopting an animal based diet or a plant based diet. These diets still have many harmful problems in common and one of the problems is that both the Plant Based and Animal Based Diet belief systems are teaching everyone to saturate their diet in fat. Chicken, Beef, Lamb, Pork, Nuts, Seeds, coconut oil, olive oil, Avocado, Nut butters, Milk, Butter, Cheese, Eggs, Fish, other oils, Nut milks, Soy milks and more. 

Chronic illness is on the rise more than ever before in our history and eating healthy high fat diets isn’t stoping it.

#medicalmedium

node.text:
Depersonalization is rampant in today’s trying times, it’s behind so many emotional and mental struggles. Toxic Heavy Metals and chemical poisons found in fragrances, scented candles, air fresheners, laundry detergents, fabric softeners, dryer sheets, cologne, perfume, carpet chemicals, pharmaceuticals, mosquito spray, bug spray, and pesticides that are entering our bodies on a daily basis are greatly responsible 

Are you feeling like you are observing yourself from outside of your body and not from the inside? Feeling like you are in a bubble, like things around you aren’t real. Or feeling
like you are in a bubble cut off from outside world? 

Many people feel so disconnected from themselves and feel numb, not hearing what others are saying to them or feeling so displaced and even isolated while around others. 
 
Depersonalization can be a sadness we can’t put our finger on that sits inside us making us doubt ourselves and our purpose. So many struggle with confidence and feel confused. 

We can break free from depersonalization and empower ourselves and learn how to heal 

For more info check out the New York Times Bestselling book Cleanse to Heal

#medicalmedium

Our emotional instability gets put on us and we are trained to believe we are the reason we feel like we do and that what we say and our actions are because we are being a difficult person. 

But there are real physical reasons to why we can’t seem to break the patterns and why we can easily become triggered back into a struggle.

Toxic Heavy Metals inside our brain are speaking for you in so many cases and Metals are not understood by the public medical industry. Toxic Heavy Metals can cause your depersonalization, bipolar, mania, unexplained sadness, anxiety, OCD, depression, and so much more.  It is not who you are, you are not those ailments, symptoms, and conditions. 

You are more than those labels, and your true self is who your soul is and deep down inside your struggle is not your fault, you are a good person and it’s critical you know this. 
 
There is a real true cause of what your going through, be good to yourself and validate your soul and body and have compassion for yourself and how strong you really truly are.

node.text:
TROUBLEMAKERS THAT MAKE US SICK: CHEMICAL INDUSTRY DOMESTIC INVADERS
 
There are many common chemicals that we use or are exposed to in everyday life that wreak havoc on our health over time. Many of them are so deeply entrenched in our culture and way of life that you may have never questioned their safety or long-term health consequences. One of the most sneaky and damaging groups is what I call "Chemical Industry Domestic Invaders". This collection of toxic chemicals affects every single one of us. While we can't always avoid exposure to these chemicals outside of the home and around other people, the good news is that there's a lot we can do within the home to reduce or prevent these chemicals from surrounding us in our domestic life.
-
These insidious toxins don't just leave the body on their own, not with the high-fat diets almost everyone has eaten for much of their life, and the pathogens and other toxins most of us have inside us. You have to know exactly how to support your body and liver in the right way so it can do the hard work of cleansing you of toxins that are deep inside your liver and cells. This is the life-saving information you will find inside the pages of Medical Medium Cleanse To Heal: Healing Plans for Sufferers of Anxiety, Depression, Acne, Eczema, Lyme, Gut Problems, Brain Fog, Weight Issues, Migraines, Bloating, Vertigo, Psoriasis, Cysts, Fatigue, PCOS, Fibroids, UTI, Endometriosis & Autoimmune.
_
Let's take a look at the troublemakers in this group:
_
Aerosol can air fresheners
-
Cologne and aftershave
-
Conventional cleaning products
-
Conventional hair dye
-
Conventional laundry detergent, fabric softener, and dryer sheets
-
Conventional makeup
-
Conventionally scented body lotions, creams, sprays, washes, and deodorants
-
Conventionally scented shampoos, conditioners, gels, and other hair products
-
Dry cleaning chemicals
-
Hairspray
-
Nail chemicals (such as polish, remover, adhesive)
-
Perfume
-
Plug-in air fresheners
-
Scented candles
-
Spray tan
-
Spray-bottle air fresheners and mists
-
Talcum powder
-
Discover how to remove these toxins from your body in Cleanse To Heal (link in profile)

Healing acne with BIG thanks to @medicalmedium 

So grateful to finally have the right information to heal once and for all🙏🏼 

Here’s some of what I do 👇🏻

✅ Celery juice everyday 

✅ Lemon water everyday 

✅ Morning cleanse almost everyday 

✅ Avoiding the no foods. Especially eggs, dairy, gluten, corn, canola oil

✅ Zinc, micro C and lemon balm 

✅ peppermint teas ☕️

✅ 369 cleanse x 2 

✅ Increased onion, garlic and greens

✅ More fruit, more veg 🍌 🍎 🥒

✅ Decreased fats 
 

‘Acne is often caused by streptococcus in the system. When it comes to acne, the strep resides in the lymphatic system’ ~ Medical Medium 

‘During a woman's menstrual cycle, 80% of the immune system is redirected towards assisting the reproductive system. That means that only 20% of the immune system is left to support any other health issues your body may be working to heal. As a result, if you normally suffer from acne, migraine headaches, eczema, fatigue, aches and pains, brain fog, depression, joint pain, or any other symptom or condition during your cycle, it may reappear or worsen’ ~ Medical Medium

node.text:
These days everyone is so worried about what they are putting in their bodies. In the grocery store people are reading the ingredient lists on packages and bottles, people want clean food, farm to table, and freshly caught or harvested foods. 

Everyone seems to be an expert on healthy eating and healthy living. Meanwhile, all these experts are drowning themselves in perfume, cologne, air fresheners, scented laundry detergents, fabric softeners, scented hair products, so called naturally derived chemical scents, while they’re burning their scented candles. 

At the same time people are saturating themselves with these chemical based products, they don’t have a clue on how many patented, poisonous, toxic chemical agents they are exposing themselves to. 

Have you ever wondered what ingredients are in perfume and cologne? Have you ever wondered what ingredients are in fragrance?

Read more about how toxic fragrances are in the New York Times Best-Selling book Cleanse To Heal

Also check out Medical Medium Podcast Episode: Air Fresheners, Scented Candles, Colognes, & Perfumes 

#medicalmedium

ALOE GRAPE SLUSHY Get the incredible healing benefits of aloe vera in this sweet grape slushy. Refreshing and delicious, this slushy makes a wonderful light breakfast or snack. If you suffer with constipation, you might find the combination of grapes and aloe vera in this drink bring you welcome relief!

Grapes contain high amounts of powerful antioxidants known as bioflavonoids, resveratrol, and anthocyanins. These phytochemicals are anti-inflammatory, anti-viral, anti-microbial, anti-aging, and anti-cancerous and provide protection against anemia, degenerative nerve diseases, heart disease, viral and fungal infections, Alzheimer’s, autoimmune disorders, and all forms of cancer. Grapes can also help provide relief from asthma, migraines, constipation, gastritis, chronic acidosis, indigestion, kidney disorders, fatigue, and vision problems.

Fresh aloe leaf gel binds onto toxic debris in the intestinal tract and carries it out of the colon during elimination. Aloe also reduces poisons and toxins in the intestinal tract so that they don’t travel up to the liver. It expels and diminishes ammonia inside the intestinal tract that otherwise seeps into the liver when food is putrefying due to low hydrochloric acid and bile production.

Aloe also works wonders for assimilation, circulation, and elimination. It is known to purify the blood, reduce inflammation, ease arthritis pain, prevent kidney stones, lower high cholesterol, prevent Candida, boost physical endurance, benefit cardiovascular health, and protect the body from oxidative stress. Aloe soothes ulcers, hemorrhoids, gastritis, diverticulitis, colitis, irritable bowel syndrome, and other digestive disorders. Aloe provides recovery from fatigue and aids in muscle function as well as optimal utilization of several vitamins, minerals, and enzymes. It’s alkaline nature, helps to soothe acidosis and alkalinize the whole body. 

Aloe Grape Slushy 

Ingredients:
2"-4" fresh aloe leaf gel
2 cups frozen seedless black or purple grapes
splash of water, if needed to blend

Directions:
Place all the ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Serve immediately.

Aloe Vera: Gut Healer
 
Aloe vera is famous for its soothing properties when applied on the outside of the body to burns, cuts, scrapes, bruises, bug bites, and most especially sunburn. Taken internally, though, fresh aloe has a much broader spectrum of potency. If you’re drawn to enemas and colonics, make aloe vera a part of your life—consuming it offers a colon cleanse all on its own. Aloe is wonderful for relieving constipation. 
 
Aloe vera also possesses more than 70 trace minerals that are grouped into undiscovered medicinal alloys. These alloys work together with the phytochemical aloin to calm inflammation in the gut, which makes it a top aid for IBS, Crohn’s, and colitis. This anti-inflammatory nature rejuvenates the appendix, as well as the ileum—a critical portion of the intestinal tract, because that’s where the body produces vitamin B12 when the digestive system is functioning as it should. That’s not all—as aloe rehabilitates the ileum, it also delivers a very bioavailable form of B12, making aloe an all-around B12 enhancer. 
 
Aloe vera is anti-bug, antifungal (including anti-mold), and anti-parasitic (including anti-worm). It is incredibly useful for killing off the pathogens that create colon cancer, stomach cancer, and rectal cancer, as well as eliminating H. pylori and supporting the pancreas. It also has the unique ability to help stop the growth of polyps and reduce the growth of hemorrhoids. And if you’re concerned that you’ve been exposed to radiation, turn to aloe—it has beta-carotene combined with lignins that remove radiation from the body.
 
How To Use:

Drink Medical Medium Aloe Water daily: 

Blend 2-4 inches of fresh aloe gel (no skin) with 16oz water.

Or eat the gel as is or blend into smoothies.
 
For more information on the healing properties of aloe vera and the symptoms and conditions it can help with, check out the New York Times best-selling book, Medical Medium Life-Changing Foods: Save Yourself and the Ones You Love with the Hidden Healing Powers of Fruits & Vegetables, and the other books in the Medical Medium series.

Repost from @drnicolepernod
•
A little TMJ motivation. Jaw pain was one of the first symptoms that led to a storm of neurological ailments hijacking my life in 2018. 👇🏽

The pain intensified and I was told to “relax and deep breathe” by my first TMJ specialist. All medical interventions made the pain worse including: chiropractic manipulation, acupuncture, botox, and trigger point injections. 

After a frantic call with said specialist, he acquiesced and referred me to a neurologist. As he expected, all of my MRIs were normal. I just had some arthritis at a place of injury. 

I saw and continue to see a wonderful orofacial specialist that unlocked my jaw and made me a night guard, which I use religiously. Despite this, my jaw remained significantly slanted. For the past few days, I have noticed something REMARKABLE: my jaw is less slanted!! 

I have come to learn that #shingles is responsible for some #TMJ disorders (a result of trigeminal nerve inflammation and pain). Shingles also attacks places of injury so arthritic areas are prime viral targets. Medical Medium @medicalmedium states this clearly in his book but I am living proof that as my viral load goes down this symptom and my facial pain are decreasing. 

I know I have more healing to do but it’s important to note progress. Slow and steady consistency pays off.

Love,
Nicole

#medicalmedium

node.text:
APPLE BLACKBERRY BARS😋{GLUTEN-FREE, DAIRY-FREE, & EGG-FREE} These wonderful Apple Blackberry Bars are a delicious treat you can enjoy with family or friends, or make for children for lunchboxes or after school snacks. Apples and blackberries are two incredible foods that bring both healing properties and flavor to this recipe.
 
Apples help cleanse and purify the organs, improve circulation in your lymphatic system, repair damaged skin, and regulate blood sugar.
 
Blackberries protect the liver from troublemakers that can cause damage; the many undiscovered antioxidants they contain help shield cells from harm.
 
Apple Blackberry Bars 
 
Ingredients:
For the filling:
1 3/4 cups finely diced apples
1 cup blackberries
1 tbsp arrowroot
2 tbsp coconut sugar
1/2 tsp cinnamon
1/8 tsp ground cloves (optional)
1/4 tsp ground ginger (optional)
 
For the base and topping:
1 cup gluten-free rolled oats
2 cups gluten free oat flour
1/2 cup coconut sugar
2 tbsp maple syrup
1/2 cup melted refined coconut oil
 
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350F/180C. Line an 8x8 inch pan with parchment paper. Set aside.
 
To make the filling, combine the diced apples, blackberries, arrowroot, coconut sugar, cinnamon, ground cloves, and ground ginger (if using) in a medium-sized bowl. Stir until evenly mixed and set aside. 
 
To make the base and topping, combine the oat flour, oats, coconut sugar, and cinnamon in a large mixing bowl. Pour in the melted coconut oil and stir until the dough clumps together.
 
Place 2 cups of the mixture into the prepared pan and set aside the rest. Press the mixture evenly to the base of the pan using your fingers or a flat-bottomed glass. 
 
Arrange the apple and blackberry filling on top of the base and spread out evenly. Sprinkle the rest of the crumb mixture over the filling. 
 
Bake for 30-35 minutes, until the filling is bubbly and the top golden. Remove from oven and cool completely before slicing into bars. 

Makes 12 bars

#medicalmedium

node.text:
Blackberries are nutritionally packed with vitamins C, E, & A, minerals magnesium, potassium, manganese, and antioxidants such as ellagic acid. Blackberries contain powerful anti-carcinogenic agents making them one of the top ORAC fruits available and one of the best fruits to eat to help prevent cancer. 

The anthocyanins in blackberries (which give them their dark color) have the ability to significantly reduce inflammation which benefits autoimmune diseases and cardiovascular diseases. The phytoestrogens in blackberries aid in the prevention of breast and cervical cancer and can relieve estrogen related symptoms such as PMS, bloating, food cravings, & hot flashes. 

They also contain salicylic acid which can inhibit atherosclerosis and protect against heart disease similarly to the way aspirin does. Blackberries can help improve eyesight and help prevent macular degeneration. The high vitamin c content in blackberries greatly support the immune system, aids in the ability to fight infection, and provides powerful anti-aging benefits. 

Blackberries high fiber content promotes healthy digestion and assimilation and aids in maintaining bowel regularity which decreases the risk of colon cancer. Try making a simple breakfast or desert of a bowl of fresh blackberries with a drizzle of raw honey or maple syrup. This delicious and antioxidant packed treat will both energize and nourish your mind and body.
